DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value representing the sum of a person's measurements on the ten Likert scales included in the Perceived Stress Scale (PSS).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Perceived Stress Scale Score Total Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A 10-item self-report questionnaire that measures a person's evaluation of the stressfulness of life situations in the past month. Each item is rated 0-4 on a 5-point Likert scale.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability._Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A 10-item self-report questionnaire that measures a person's evaluation of the stressfulness of life situations in the past month. Each item is rated 0-4 on a 5-point Likert scale.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A 10-item self-report questionnaire that measures a person's evaluation of the stressfulness of life situations in the past month. Each item is rated 0-4 on a 5-point Likert scale. (Cohen, et al, J Health Soc Behav, 24 (1983))
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Property.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Released as part of caDSR clean up. mc 7/12/12

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Generic value domain for a primitive java dataype that is an Integer (32-bit two's complement).

ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: 10.14.20 TL changed WFS from DRAFT NEW to RETIRED ARCHIVED and added an End Date in preparation of OneData.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Scoring
ReferenceDocuments.description: PSS scores are obtained by reversing responses (e.g., 0 = 4, 1 = 3, 2 = 2, 3 = 1 & 4 = 0) to the four positively stated items (items 4, 5, 7, & 8) and then summing across all scale items.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Measure Authors
ReferenceDocuments.description: Cohen, S., Kamarck, T., and Mermelstein, R.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Scoring Information
ReferenceDocuments.description: A short 4 item scale can be made from questions 2, 4, 5 and 10 of the PSS 10 item scale.

DataElement.changeDescription: Modified long name and definition to meet quality criteria prior to release as part of caDSR clean up. mc 7/12/12
